PerfectNetExp.abs: here's a real-life example , a challenge a team of our engineers once faced : designing a spell-checker for the Google search engine .这是一个现实中的例子，我们的工程师小组曾经面对过一个挑战：为Google的搜索引擎设计一个拼写检查工具。

list.abs: speii是什么意思_百度知道 ... spell: 拼写|拼字|法术 spell checker: 拼写检查程序|拼写检查器|拼写检查.
all the components share a common spelling checker and other tools , which are used consistently across the suite .所有的组件共享一个共同的拼写检查器和其他工具，整个套件中保持一致。

means.word_mean: 1. an electronic dictionary in a word processor that can be used to catch misspelled words
